title: Great experience
text: Very nice experience, a relaxing day with captain and Paris and Poppy. It would be important for everyone in this fantastic Limnos.

title: Very nice!!
text: Especially if you are traveling with kids, this will be a trip to remember!!  From picking and clearing the nets to swimming in secluded beach that can be reached only by sea and eating really fresh fish cooked on boardüëç Many thanks to our captain and of course Theopoula that took care of us.  Hope we see you again!! ‚Ä¶
